item.title: Credentials with 2FA: How It Works and How Attackers Bypass It
item.description: Read the full post on Medium Hello everyone! I’m Akshat Patel, pursuing a master’s in cybersecurity. I’m constantly learning and sharing insights with others. Today, I want to talk about Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) and how attackers bypass this crucial layer of security. In this post, I’ll cover: What 2FA is How tools like ReelPhish and others bypass it Best practices for staying secure I’m not a professional yet, but I’m getting there, and I’d love your feedback.
